title: Lunar Revel Store 2016 Changing discounted skins
body:
This morning I logged into my League account, excited for the new Lunar Revel Store. I was very please with what discounts I had received. I then logged out to do something and when I logged back into my account, I viewed my Lunar Revel store and saw that 3 of the discounts had changed. I am extremely annoyed because I was looking forward to those exact three skins. Has anyone else had this issue? Or am I the only unlucky person here? 

Is there anyway to fix this and get those three discounts back?

replies.body:
Hey Elsavon665 - 

The skins that are being replaced in your Lunar Revel Shop are scheduled to go on sale either in January or February. We don't want you to get a Lunar Revel sale only to see it in a regular sale over the next few days, so we have replaced those sales in the Lunar Revel Shop with different offers.

You'll be able to purchase these skins at a discount in February. You can grab the full list [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/february-sales-schedule).

Ok. Do you think a 50% is better than 70%? I don't think so. I was going to buy the skin. Now I won't. :(

The same thing happened to me. I was planning on buying Hired Gun Lucian at 50% off but the change happened the next time I logged on. I got Arclight Vayne instead... However I already have multiple Vayne skins so I am extremely disappointed. This first picture is my initial Lunar Revel draw, but the next picture is my Lucian discount replaced with Vayne. Rito pls help so you can take more of my money.
